page.title: 10Fishing in Cound Brook.
page.content: We had a week off school.In that week I went to Cound Brook to fish for trout.When we got there I went to the brook with my net,tub and wellies on. I had to duck down in the long wet grass so the fish would not see me.My green 'T' Shirt helped to camouflage me.I peered through the rails and saw a trout moving his fins and hovering in the same place.It was coloured a gloomy grey.I swooshed at it with my net.I missed it! It flew off so fast I could not see it.All I could do now was to slip the net over the hole that I thought it had gone in.Then I propped the end of the net on the rails. With my long stick I prodded around in the reeds.He rushed out of the side reeds and tricked me.I did not know where he went then,so I said,"I give up!"and walked off.
